disclaimer.title: Legal Disclaimer

important.title: Important Notice
important.content: This AI-powered legal assistant is designed to help you draft documents and provide general legal information. However, it is not a substitute for professional legal advice from a qualified attorney.

noLegalAdvice.title: No Legal Advice
noLegalAdvice.content: The information and documents generated by this service do not constitute legal advice. The AI system provides general guidance based on the information you provide, but cannot account for all nuances of your specific situation or jurisdiction.

aiLimitations.title: AI Limitations
aiLimitations.content: While our AI uses advanced technology, it may produce inaccurate, incomplete, or outdated information. AI-generated content should always be reviewed by a qualified legal professional before being used in any legal proceedings or official capacity.

userResponsibility.title: User Responsibility
userResponsibility.content: You are solely responsible for reviewing and verifying any documents or information generated by this service. By using this platform, you agree to consult with a licensed attorney for matters requiring legal advice.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: Information you provide may be processed by AI systems to generate responses. Please do not share sensitive personal information unless necessary. We implement security measures to protect your data, but no system is completely secure.

errors.mustAccept: You must accept the disclaimer to continue
errors.failed: Failed to accept disclaimer. Please try again.

item1.question: When will Legal AI be available?
item1.answer: We're currently in closed beta with select users. We expect to open public access in Q1 2026. Joining the waitlist ensures you'll be among the first to know when we launch.

item2.question: Will there be a free trial?
item2.answer: Yes! Early access users will receive an extended free trial period to explore all features. After that, we offer flexible pricing plans for individuals and teams.

item3.question: Is my data secure?
item3.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-grade encryption and never share your data with third parties. Your documents and information are strictly confidential and used only to provide our services.

item4.question: What types of legal documents can it handle?
item4.answer: Legal AI supports a wide range of document types including lawsuits, contracts, complaints, motions, and official letters. We're constantly expanding our template library based on user feedback.

item5.question: Can I use Legal AI for client work?
item5.answer: Yes, Legal AI is designed for professional use. However, we always recommend having AI-generated documents reviewed by a qualified legal professional before use in official proceedings.

bottomCta.title: Ready to Transform Your Legal Work?

hero.title: How Legal AI
hero.subtitle: Discover how our AI-powered platform transforms legal work into a streamlined, efficient process. From case analysis to document generation, see how we help legal professionals save time and deliver better outcomes.

caseAnalysis.title: Case Analysis
caseAnalysis.description: Describe your legal situation in plain language and let our AI identify the relevant legal grounds.
caseAnalysis.details: Our advanced AI analyzes your case description and identifies applicable laws, regulations, and legal precedents that form the foundation of your legal argument.
caseAnalysis.feature1: Natural language input - no legal jargon required
caseAnalysis.feature2: AI identifies relevant legal grounds and articles

legalQa.description: Ask questions and get AI-powered answers backed by real legal citations.

legalQa.feature2: Get answers with proper legal citations

documentGeneration.description: AI creates professional legal documents based on templates customized to your case.

documentGeneration.feature2: AI auto-fills based on your case data

hero.title: Empowering Legal
hero.subtitle: We're on a mission to democratize access to professional legal tools through the power of artificial intelligence.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Making legal excellence accessible to everyone
mission.description: Legal AI was founded with a simple but powerful belief: that every legal professional and individual deserves access to high-quality legal tools and information. We're combining cutting-edge AI technology with deep legal expertise to create a platform that saves time, reduces costs, and improves outcomes.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for the highest quality in everything we do, from AI accuracy to user experience.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We believe in transparency, honesty, and always putting our users first.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously push the boundaries of what's possible with AI in the legal domain.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We're committed to making professional legal tools available to everyone who needs them.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: From challenge to opportunity
story.description: Legal AI was born from a personal frustration with the inefficiencies and high costs of traditional legal work. Our founders, with backgrounds in both law and technology, saw an opportunity to leverage recent advances in AI to transform how legal professionals work.

hero.title: Simple, Transparent
hero.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. Upgrade or downgrade at any time.

items.question: Can I change plans at any time?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express. For Enterprise plans, we also support bank transfers.

items.question: Is there a free trial for paid plans?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial for the Professional and Team plans. No credit card required to start.

items.question: Do you offer discounts for nonprofits or academics?
items.answer: Yes, we offer special pricing for qualified nonprofits, academic institutions, and legal aid organizations. Contact us for details.

items.question: What happens to my data if I cancel?
items.answer: You can export all your data before canceling. We retain your data for 30 days after cancellation, after which it's permanently deleted.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Choose the plan that works best for you and start transforming your legal practice today.

hero.title: Frequently Asked
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Legal AI. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.

items.question: What is Legal AI?
items.answer: Legal AI is an AI-powered legal platform that helps legal professionals and individuals draft documents, analyze cases, research case law, and get answers to legal questions. Our platform uses advanced AI trained on Polish legal texts and court rulings.

items.question: Who is Legal AI for?
items.answer: Legal AI is designed for legal professionals (attorneys, in-house counsel, paralegals), law students, and individuals who need help with legal matters. Our tools are professional-grade but accessible to everyone.

items.question: Is Legal AI a substitute for a lawyer?
items.answer: No. Legal AI is a tool that helps legal professionals work more efficiently and provides information to individuals. It is not a substitute for professional legal advice. We always recommend consulting with a qualified attorney for legal matters.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-grade encryption (AES-256) and are fully GDPR compliant. Your data is never shared with third parties, and we maintain the highest standards of data protection and confidentiality.

items.question: How accurate is the AI?
items.answer: Our AI is trained on thousands of Polish legal texts and court rulings, providing high accuracy. However, AI-generated content should always be reviewed by a qualified legal professional before use in official proceedings.

items.question: What is included in the Free plan?
items.answer: The Free plan includes 5 documents per month, basic case analysis, limited legal Q&A queries, access to standard templates, and community support.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access continues until the end of your billing period, after which you won't be charged again.

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team within 14 days for a full refund.

items.question: Are there any hidden fees?
items.answer: No. All pricing is transparent and displayed upfront. There are no setup fees, cancellation fees, or hidden charges.

items.question: What types of documents can I generate?
items.answer: Legal AI supports a wide range of document types including lawsuits (pozew), complaints (skarga), contracts (umowa), motions (wniosek), and official letters. Our template library is constantly expanding.

items.question: Can I customize the generated documents?
items.answer: Yes, all generated documents are fully editable. You can modify any part of the document, add or remove sections, and customize formatting to meet your specific needs.

items.question: How does the case analysis feature work?
items.answer: Simply describe your legal situation in plain language. Our AI analyzes your description and identifies relevant legal grounds, applicable laws, potential precedents, and suggests strategies based on Polish legal texts and court rulings.

items.question: Can I share documents with my team?
items.answer: Yes, on Team and Enterprise plans, you can share documents with team members, set access permissions, and collaborate in real-time with comments and version history.

items.question: Is Legal AI GDPR compliant?
items.answer: Yes, Legal AI is fully GDPR compliant. We have implemented comprehensive data protection measures, provide data processing agreements, and respect all user rights under GDPR.

items.question: Do you use my data to train your AI?
items.answer: We may use anonymized, aggregated data to improve our AI models. We never use your specific documents or personal information without explicit consent. See our Privacy Policy for details.

items.question: Where is my data stored?
items.answer: Data is stored in secure data centers located within the European Union, ensuring compliance with EU data protection regulations.

items.question: Can I export my data?
items.answer: Yes, you can export all your documents and data at any time from your account settings.

items.question: Do I need to install anything?
items.answer: No. Legal AI is a web-based platform that works in any modern browser. There's nothing to install or update.

items.question: Is there an API?
items.answer: Yes, Team and Enterprise plans include API access for programmatic integration with your existing systems.

items.question: What browsers are supported?
items.answer: Legal AI supports all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend using the latest version for the best experience.

items.question: How do I get technical support?
items.answer: Free plan users can access our community forums and knowledge base. Professional and Team plan users get priority email support. Enterprise users get dedicated support with guaranteed response times.

testimonial2.quote: I was skeptical at first, but the AI-powered document drafting has already saved me hours every week.

item1.question: Is this different from requesting a demo?
item1.answer: Yes! A demo shows you the product as it exists today. Early access interest means you want to be notified when new features become available and may get beta access before the general public. There's no sales call—just genuine interest in future capabilities.

item2.question: When will I get access?
item2.answer: We're rolling out early access in phases over the next few months. Timeline depends on your use case and current capacity. Most users receive access within 2-8 weeks. We'll keep you updated throughout the process.

item3.question: Is early access free?
item3.answer: Yes! Early access includes a free trial period with full feature access. After the trial, early adopters receive exclusive discounted pricing. There's no obligation to continue if it's not right for you.

item4.question: What features are included in early access?
item4.answer: Early access includes our complete feature set: AI-powered document drafting, case analysis, legal Q&A, case law search, and collaboration tools. You'll also get preview access to features still in development.

item5.question: Can I use early access for client work?
item5.answer: Yes, but we recommend reviewing AI-generated content as you would with any legal tool. Early access is production-ready, and many of our users already use it for client matters. Always exercise professional judgment.

item6.question: What if I change my mind?
item6.answer: No problem! You can opt out at any time with a single click. There's no commitment and we won't pressure you. Your interest helps us plan, but you're free to walk away anytime.
